UI Modified:
1.Remove “Products” module from home page. Please tap “+” icon at the top right corner in “My Devices” to add devices.
2.Remove “Rapid replacement”, “Report an issue”, “My issue” and “FAQ” from “Community” to “My profile”.

2.Remove “Rapid replacement”, “Report an issue”, “My issue” and “FAQ” from “Community” to “My profile”.
